entry.title: Category & Tag System
entry.content:
So, this post is here to explain my methodology for the categorizatoin and tagging of posts, namely the main differences between types of post.

Alright, categories will be in one of several types including intro[1], coding[2], gaming[3], writing[4], and other[5].

  1. An introductory post allowing me to add information about a variety of subjects. ↩

  2. A post about one of my code projects. ↩

  3. A post about games I play, especially tabletop games or Second Life. ↩

  4. A post about creative writing projects. ↩

  5. A post that does not fit into any other category. ↩

entry.title: welcome
entry.content:
Hello, this is my update journal, just a little jekyll blog where I can post updates on the various projects I enjoy participating in, not all of which are code related. I will categorize and tag all posts properly, whether they deal with code, writing, or whatever else.

Now I’m not the worlds best blogger, in fact, I forget I even had a blog more often than not! I suppose I’ll try with this one, however, it shouldn’t be so hard, since all the files for this blog are right here on my hard drive.

Anyways, I suppose I should leave off for now, the dog needs to go out, so I’ll post again later… maybe….
